community.name: VRosity
community.description: VRosity is a video production community that specializes in creating new and innovating VR video productions & techniques.

community.name: Local Police Department
community.description:
Welcome the LPD, one of VRChats oldest and largest roleplaying groups bringing entertainment to public lobbies since 2018. The LPD hosts daily VRChat events where officers are assigned to a squad to create roleplay scenarios in public lobbies, themed around interactions with the public and emergency services. Due to the nature of improv, anything can happen during these events. From drug busts and shootouts, to checking mirror dwelling licenses. 

To join the LPD check out the recruitment channel on our Discord at <color=#7289daff>discord.gg/lpd</color>. There you will find the application form as well as our handbook which is packed with all kinds of important information. Once accepted you will go through cadet training, before jumping into patrolling VRChat as an official LPD officer. When you have some experience under your belt you can take additional training to move up the ranks or specialize into other kinds of roleplay that we offer.

Patrol officers will arrest people and bring them to the LPD station to take their mugshot that then gets posted on our discord server for everyone to see. If they choose to not come quietly we have our swat team, known as SLRT, to help persuade them. Once the suspect has been processed they will be handed over to our Corrections Officers and given a nice new home in the LPD Prison with all the other prisoners. And if anyone gets hurt in the process they can be treated by the LMT at our Hospital. To find out how you can help keep the streets of VRChat safe, join our Discord or follow us on Twitter @LPD_vr.

community.name: Metropolitan Police Service
community.description: We're a friendly police RP community, who patrol worlds of VRChat. As you can see, we have been heavily influenced by the real UK Met Police, which is of course our inspiration, and what we have based our department on.

community.name: Ookami Collective
community.description: We are a Hub for people that loves Mikos and Ukon Avatars in General. our fanatism of these models/Characters, is what makes us happy.

community.name: Megabuilding 325
community.description: M325 is a roleplay hub that doubles as creator world. Set in a cyberpunk aesthetic, we offer creators a place to show their work and possibly get commissions all while roleplaying. Ever thought it would be could if your character could buy something and the thing would actually exist? Then why not buy stuff in roleplay from someone that can make it a reality! We also offer guild missions, combat and more!

Events are hosted regularly by the week, participating in world hops, PVP matches with other Avatar PvP communities, Different types of Light RP, Large Scale Re-Created battles and more. Our leadership team is friendly and active with a large player base and many regulars. We welcome any and all to participate and enjoy the community we've grown!

community.name: The Mighty Gym
community.description: The Mighty Gym is the ultimate social fitness experience in VR«É Join us for group classes of up to 30 people‚Äö lead by real certified instructors‚Äö where you can test your fitness skills in one of our 9 themed workouts‚Ä§ With technology to track your form‚Äö and give you a score for your performance‚Äö you can be sure to hit your fitness goals and have loads of fun with your friends every time«É

community.name: Neon Divide
community.description:
The World's Largest Episodic Virtual Reality Production!
Neon Divide has a cast of over 150 Characters across four world maps. Using VRChat‚Äôs platform, we have been able to find a user-friendly way to host this large scale production. All the maps and avatars are custom-made with Neon Divide in mind. While the overall storyline and plot are written and directed by professional game masters, the majority of the story is created in real-time as events unfold in this living world.

community.name: Tuatha D√© Danann
community.description:
Welcome to Tuatha D√© Danann, a community which revolves around a hidden society of mages and their many associates‚Äö all of which have evaded the ever-watching eyes of a world ruled by corrupt Megacorps‚Ä§

We'll be offering a variety of fun and unique activities for our members‚Äö such as story-based events‚Äö hangouts‚Äö game nights‚Äö and many more«É It should also be mentioned that the Tuatha D√© Danann isn't just for members of our community‚Äö but also for friends and and people looking to have fun«É If you're still reading this‚Äö then we've probably caught your interest‚Ä§ Perhaps continue and see what else is in store?

community.name: AWMC Industries
community.description:
Step into the boundless universe of the Allied Waifu Military Core Industries also known as AI‚Äö your premier universewide military arms dealer«É
Set in the spacefaring era of the year 2200Ôºã‚Äö AWMC Industries stands as a beacon of innovation in the vast expanse of space‚Ä§

When Earth fell victim to an unknown extraterrestrial force during the chaos of the Third World War‚Äö advanced weaponry‚Äö including machine soldiers powered by artificial intelligence‚Äö clashed in a desperate bid for survival‚Ä§ Amidst the devastation‚Äö these androids emerged‚Äö alerting humanity to the imminent threat approaching earth‚Ä§
Despite the warnings‚Äö blinded by greed‚Äö many humans ignored the approaching catastrophe‚Ä§ Until it was too late‚Ä§
A select few androids and humans escaped Earth's demise‚Äö vowing to safeguard humanity's legacy and principles‚Ä§ Thus‚Äö they founded a military dedicated to preserving these ideals‚Äö recognizing that a formidable arsenal is the way of survival‚Ä§
Emerging as a prominent arms manufacturer and formidable military force‚Äö AI stands as a beacon of strength and integrity‚Äö its vast fleet traversing the galaxies to uphold its values‚Ä§

Whether you're a seasoned spacefarer or a green recruit‚Äö AI welcomes all to forge the destiny of galaxies‚Ä§ Enlist today and be the bastion of humanitys legacy‚Ä§

CautionÀ∏ Enlisting requires disposal of your biological embodiment‚Ä§

community.name: 1st Imperial Guards Army
community.description:
Welcome to the 1st Imperial Guards Army!

We‚Äôre an alternate history WW1-military VRChat roleplay group.

We host weekly immersive RP events in the Kingdom of Prussia;
Daily Life of Soldiers
Combat RP
Military Training
Ceremonies

From epic battles in the front lines, to infiltrating enemy positions, or simply living out the daily life of a soldier, our events tell an ongoing narrative which is influenced by all of our members. Want to know more? If rising the ranks, serving the true King, and wearing good-looking uniforms appeals to you, then the 1st Imperial Guards Army is the place for you!

- https://discord.gg/ZMP49H3zSY

Join now, become part of our growing community, and leave your mark on the 1st Imperial Guards Army!

community.description: We are a social VRChat Roleplay that encourages new folk and veterans alike to step on in and join in on the fun! We welcome all levels of experience to the Roleplay as an introduction to the grander Metaverse scene in VRCRP

Members are encouraged to meet new friends, join events & have fun, do something new and try new experiences. Omega is also a server for creators to showcase their craft, may it be Video/Audio Production, Avatar/World Creation, and many more!

community.name: Noved Squad
community.description:
Home of the Noved Notes Podcast«É
A VRChat Podcast that talks about the amazing creators of VRChat«É

In the Noved Squad Community‚Äö we do a bunch of hangouts‚Äö game nights‚Äö DJ Noved Party Nights‚Äö and collaborate to make amazing creations on VRChat«É

Overall we just like to have fun«É

community.name: RWBY Journey Beyond Remnant
community.description:
RWBY JBR is a Canon multi-crossover AU VRC RP that has a wide variety of characters from a variety of different series and franchises that come together in one place.

The focus of the roleplay will be on exploring the different plot points of each season, delving into the perspectives of each character. It's worth noting that certain significant details might undergo alterations, like the demise of a character or a shift in the timeline of events. As seasons unfolds, we'll remain engaged in the otherworldly realm or dimension we find ourselves in. Throughout the replay, the choices you make will shape your character, highlighting both your strengths and weaknesses. Moreover, your decisions will also have a direct impact on the overall narrative of the story

community.name: VRDancing
community.description:
"VRDancing is a beginner-friendly community of dancers that host weekly dance, fitness and hangout events in EU and NA timezones. We welcome any dancer! 

No Full Body Tracking required, some even join without VR! 

Whether you just started and lack confidence, or are a veteran dancer with years of IRL experience, we hope you'll find your place here! 

Our main dancing events are accessible to any skill level and are an excellent place to start dancing in VRChat! "

community.name: TailBass
community.description:
TailBass is a coalition of international DJs, dance and music club organizers, event hosts, programmers, lighting and video experts, and developers from all across the VRChat furry community. They selflessly volunteer their time, energy, and expertise to host awesome and stunning rave events for the furry community and friends.

Many organizations throughout VRChat incorporate TailBass specialists to enhance their club experience, with weekly raves held across multiple timezones. TailBass personnel have also helped host major joint-efforts and raves between multiple organizations, including WaterWolf and Vibe Night, and for major events such as New Years Eve.

community.name: SCP Foundation of VR
community.description: The SCP Foundation of VRChat is a roleplay community inspired by the SCP universe. We utilize our own content and lore to keep things new and engaging. Players can create their own characters, anomalies and stories and have it all played out in our weekly events.

community.name: CozyCon Online
community.description: CozyCon Online is a yearly multi-fandom/industry virtual convention with monthly community events and year round vendors that take place on Discord, Twitch and in VRChat.

community.name: Fractured Thrones
community.description: Fractured Thrones is a low-fantasy medieval roleplay inspired by LOTR‚Äö and Warhammer Fantasy‚Äö and created by Mr‚Ä§ Brunswick‚Ä§ It is comprised of many different role-players‚Äö custom assets‚Äö and tons of hard work and dedication‚Ä§ We welcome new faces«É

Events are hosted regularly by the week, participating in world hops, PVP matches with other Warhammer communities, Laserdome tournaments, game nights, and more. Our leadership team is friendly and active with a large playerbase and many regulars. We welcome any and all to participate and enjoy the community we've grown.

community.name: Skits'N'Bits
community.description: We're a creative‚Äö fun‚Äö and welcoming improv community offering weekly workshops for all skill levels 18 and older and serve as a hub for skits‚Äö sketches, projects‚Äö and other VR performative collabs«É

community.name: Koch≈ç no Yakuza
community.description: Koch≈ç no Yakuza is a VRChat roleplay community themed after the Yakuza game series and Japanese culture in general. The group was founded on 1st of September 2021 by Ginger Tea. They wish to provide, bring together and entertain. Providing a friendlier place for VRChat public to roleplay in is one of the aims they wish to achieve, alongside with helping other communities with bigger projects. Bringing together both new and veteran players who have nowhere else to go, educating people about VRChat as a whole and keeping them up to date on what is going on in this vast but confusing place. Entertaining both the public and their people with external and internal roleplay which are still in development. Giving people a place to feel welcomed and a place anybody can feel they belong to.

community.name: Pool Parlor
community.description: The Pool Parlor is a community striving to make a strong connection with everyone and one of the best pool tables around!

community.name: Soaring Fitness
community.description: We are a VR-based workout group, focused on being freely accessible. Our hard working team of Volunteers offer their time and experience to make it all possible. Our Certified Personal Trainers work with our Volunteer Instructors to bring you workouts 7 days a week! We believe good health and fitness should not be gated behind a paywall!

community.name: RIFT
community.description: We are a lore centric, sci-fi music venue focused on uplifting and promoting those in the VRC rave scene in a positive direction!

community.name: Rindo Cult
community.description: Built upon a foundation of love towards the Rindo base model (By Jingo Channel), Rindo cult is a fusion blend of cultures and bases, proud to offer a place of unity and joy to all. Whether you seek intellectual discussions, artistic collaborations, or simply a space to unwind and let loose, Rindo Cult offers it all. With events that span across all time zones of the world Rindo *Not-A-Cult* welcomes you with open arms, no matter your affinity!

community.name: United Police Department
community.description: The United Police Department functions as a roleplaying community, venturing across various virtual worlds to craft engaging scenarios for Vrchat players to witness or take part in. Beyond our roleplay endeavors, we organize enjoyable events aimed at fostering connections within the community and forging lasting friendships.

community.name: Clone Troopers of VRChat
community.description: We are an RP group based off of the Clone Wars from Star Wars. We host large-scale events, training, and hangouts throughout the week. Our community has a dedicated Dev Team who create worlds for us to enjoy, weapons for us to use, and MASSIVE RP events for you all to experience.

community.name: Death Korps of VR
community.description: The Death Korps of VR is a social, Role play, and PvP group representing the Death Korps of Krieg of the Astra Militarum set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe.

community.name: The Necron Empire
community.description:
The Necron Empire is a VRChat based Avatar PvP group‚Äö we use these Avatars to fight Duells all the way to 40 people Battles with the Theme being from Warhammer 40k‚Ä§ ÔºàDark Sci-FiÔºâ

We enjoy a loose culture in our group and encourage a good‚Äö fun but semi serious attitude‚Ä§

Due to how our system works we are a PC only community

community.name: Hoppou Foundation
community.description: We're The Hoppou Foundation«É We're Hoppou Raiders‚Äö Role-players‚Äö Gamers‚Äö Avatar & World Creators‚Äö Artists and more«É

community.description: Abyssal Poilice Division is The Home & Hub of our Officer, Enforcer, Detective and Mage Role-Play's, Serving as The Janky Fun Peace Keepers & Brutal Enforcers of our Abyss.

community.name: Ministry Promotions
community.description: Aproffessional & strategic option for vr event logistics an promotions

community.name: Chimkins
community.description:
We are a small team working on VRChat worlds and planning to release more in the future. Our main goal is to make a world that is fun to play and great for hanging out with friends.

We currently have 2 worlds released publically:
- Zombie Survival
- The Hunt

community.name: No Friends Friends Club
community.description: A social group and gathering that focuses on helping people struggling with social anxiety to come out and practice social skills while making friends along the way.

community.name: Studio Penrose
community.description: Studio Penrose is an independent VR film studio striving to make new and unique lore-driven stories. The group is comprised of many members of all backgrounds who work together to create films for all audiences to enjoy.

community.name: Projekt G.A.T.E
community.description: Projekt G.A.T.E is a milsim group based on the anime/manga called, "Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri or Gate: Thus, the Japanese Self-Defense Force Fought There." Using our own flare of the storyline of the anime/manga to get us there in roleplay.

community.name: Portuguese Armed Forces
community.description:
We are a VRChat Military Simulation Roleplay group based on the Armed Forces of Portugal! In our wonderful community you have a lot of things you can
do from enjoying your time as a civilian to enlisting in our ranks and have amazing experiences in our events, trainings, hangouts and operations.
Our goal is to make a welcoming community for everyone to enjoy while sharing a little bit of what the Portuguese are about, this is the place for you to
make new friends and enjoy your time, on top of that you can even get your own custom avatar to wear in our events, so what are you waiting for?

community.name: ScoutTheColdie
community.description: The Goldie Lounge is a vibrant social club founded in January 2024‚Äö dedicated to curating unforgettable music events and fostering meaningful connections within its community‚Ä§ With a passion for music and a commitment to creating inclusive spaces‚Äö Goldie Lounge brings together music enthusiasts from all walks of life to share in the joy of live performances and social gatherings‚Ä§ Whether you're a seasoned music aficionado or simply looking to explore new sounds‚Äö the Goldie Lounge invites you to join us in celebrating the power of music to unite and uplift‚Ä§ Come discover your rhythm at the Goldie Lounge‚Ä§

community.name: FireteamVR
community.description: FireteamVR is a passion project aimed at becoming the first massive PvP-integrated avatar community in VRChat. Participate in battlefield-inspired firefights in any world, featuring unique military-anime-style PvP avatars with interactive weapons and high customizations

community.name: Galactic Republic of VRChat
community.description: We are a community of people in VRChat who are passionate about the Prequels era of Star Wars that hosts hangout events every Saturday with additional side events in between!

community.name: Mortisian Kingdom
community.description: The Mortisian Syndicate is a Largescale Persistent Life styled Roleplay Community that hosts Events near every day save for Sunday. We teach members how to utilize Real Life Skills in a Roleplay Setting and tell indepth and inclusive stories through the Medium of VR. If you like DnD, or LARP, you'll find your Home here amongst the Syndicate!

community.name: Furry Event Community
community.description: Welcome to the Furry Event Community! This is your go-to hub for all things furry events. Whether you're looking to attend conventions, participate in online meetups, or share your own events, you'll find a friendly and inclusive space here. Connect with fellow furries, stay updated on upcoming events, and dive into engaging discussions. Join us and be part of a vibrant community where the fun never stops!

community.name: Blue Star
community.description:
Blue Star is a VRChat roleplay community that displays a mix of vibrant and colourful themes inspired by games like Blue Archive and twists it by throwing in mysterious and dangerous entities inspired by those you would see in works such as the SCP archives or Lobotomy Corporation.

You work for Blue Star, a corporation that publicly displays itself as a security and research organisation, but behind closed doors they are dedicated to the research of the mysterious "Rifts" and the abnormalities that come from within them.

Perhaps you are just a simple civilian looking for work when you stumbled across this company, or maybe you had an encounter with an abnormality which led to you discovering us, or maybe you have come from a rift yourself and find yourself seeking answers?

Whatever the case, Blue Star is here to uncover the mysteries that await us beyond the veil and beyond what we understand as reality.

community.name: Boothplorer
community.description: A third-party item and avatar catalogue for VRChat.

community.name: ArgusVRC
community.description: We are a team and community creating a Sword Art Online VRChat game. Our project features an interactive world, save systems, PVP/PVE combat, and community events. Join us to experience the world of Sword Art Online in VRChat!

community.name: Teal Banner
community.description:
The Teal Banner is a RolePlay community based on a completely hand written lore set in a medieval fantasy land based on writings by DeliriousJax. Come and learn of the world as you explore Kingdoms, discover magic, and help guide the path of fates! Focusing on minimal dice rolling in favor of quality of story and player actions, this roleplay brings the story and immersion to the forefront of our experiences and interactions.

Whether you'd like to keep it humble as a Clergy, seek the mysticism of a Magical studier, craft and design runes as a Runesmith, or you wish to wield the authority of a Crown sworn sword; there are many ways to pursue your part in this long term story telling community!

Human, Elf, Beastkin, Halfling, Dwarf. You choose your starting point and begin the life of n adventurer in the Chronicles of Wyl!
